#summary Method extraMaterialsForTypeID details

= /extraMaterialsForTypeID/(typeID) =

List of extra materials for given item typeID.

== Attributes ==
    
|| activityID || Number ||
|| activityName || String ||
|| damagePerJob || String ||
|| quantity || Number ||
|| requiredTypeCategoryID || Number ||
|| requiredTypeGroupID || String ||
|| requiredTypeGroupName || String ||
|| requiredTypeID || Number ||
|| requiredTypeName || String ||
|| requiredTypeNameGraphicIcon || String ||

== Examples ==

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/extraMaterialsForTypeID/1234567890 extraMaterialsForTypeID/1234567890] (HTTP 400)

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/extraMaterialsForTypeID/blah-blah extraMaterialsForTypeID/blah-blah] (HTTP 400)
